title: Introduction to Algorithms
author: Thomas H. Cormen
description: A comprehensive guide to data structures and algorithms, essential for computer science students.

title: Calculus: A New Horizon
author: Howard Anton
description: Explores the fundamental concepts of calculus, from limits and derivatives to integrals.

title: Fundamentals of Physics
author: Halliday & Resnick
description: The gold standard for introductory physics courses, covering mechanics, waves, and thermodynamics.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: A groundbreaking narrative of humanity's creation and evolution.

title: Freakonomics
author: Steven D. Levitt
description: A rogue economist explores the hidden side of everything.
